title: Answering Your Questions About... Everything!!
itunes:title: Answering Your Questions About... Everything!
description:
It’s just us this week, and we’ve got all your questions covered. We truly cover a little bit of everything in this episode, like dating (yes, we are on the apps. No, it’s not fun), travel rituals, reading (of course!), the future of the pod (total world podcast domination), and so much more! It was fun to get to interview ourselves this week!

Meanwhile, Grace is feeling like she’s getting her life together post-tour, and Becca read two full books during the long weekend. Also, head to our Instagram for a chance to win a copy of our July book club, American Spy!

 Sponsor:

  • Nicely Noted:
    • For 50% off your first month subscription, go to nicelynoted.com and enter code BOP10 at checkout.
  • Lola:
    • For 40% off your subscription, go to mylola.com and enter code BOP at checkout.

Books Mentioned:

Three Women

My Lovely Wife

Final Girls

Verity

The Woman Inside

The Other Woman

The Last Time I Lied

The Good Liar

The Conspiracy of Us

The Paper Princess

All These Beautiful Strangers

Very Nice

How Could She

Save Me The Plums

 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
